channel.title: Timers and check for system.out.print
channel.description: i am trying to make a auto restart that restarts whenever the server doesn't reconize any system outprints back from the bat file, so the server has a int that makes a timer so that every 10 seconds it sends a systemoutprint to the server , when the server doesn't seem any systemoutprints anymore it restarts, so this is my question , is it possible to do this ?

item.title: Timers and check for system.out.print
